After sign informed consent , subject assess gastroenterologist , surgeon ( diagnose perianal disease assess need surgery ) HBOT specialist assess capability subject undergo HBOT treatment.After screen period , eligible subject enter 8 week HBOT treatment period , combine TNFalpha blocker treatment . All patient MRI TRUS examination assess fistula also blood test CBC , chemistry , inflammatory marker cytokine analysis . Same evaluation repeat end study .
